document_data.name: Gunderman Brewery
document_data.mainbody: '''Gunderman Brewery''' was a ramshackle old barn that was converted to a brewery in [[New Velar|Harrowdale]].
document_data.Locations: The brewery was located near the end of [[Lancegallop Lane]] on the east side of town near the coast.
document_data.Description: The most anyone saw of the brewery was the main vat room located on the ground level. It was here that the tasty [[Old Smoke]] [[ale]] was made.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Gunderman Brewmaster]] owned the brewery and ran it with his three enormous but well-meaning sons and a host of [[human]], [[dwarf]] and [[gnome]] employees, who seemed to be constantly expanding the cellars of the brewery or installing pumps to keep seepage from the [[Dragon Reach]] at bay.
